fields.headline: You review 2005
fields.bodyText: Plays, albums, operas, buildings, TV shows, gigs ... What's enthralled you? Enraged you? Has something touched a chord, or a raw nerve? Write a 100-word review of your 2005 arts highlight - or turkey - and send it to review@observer.co.uk (subject: 2005 Arts Review). Please avoid sending attachments ... they don't always work. Or post it to 2005 Arts Review, The Observer, 3-7 Herbal Hill, London EC1R 5EJ. In either case, please include a daytime phone number. Closing date 8 December. We will publish the best reviews alongside our critics' annual round-up in the newspaper and online.
